Footer.aboutUs: Since 2017, our company has been engaged in car and motorbike sales, trust sales, car management and trailer rental.

About-us.title: About us
About-us.paragraph-1: At our company, we pride ourselves on bringing together a diverse group of experts in the automotive industry. Our team is composed of seasoned professionals who are passionate about cars and dedicated to providing the highest quality of service.
About-us.paragraph-2: Whether you're looking to buy a new vehicle, need repair services for your current one, or want to rent a trailer, we have the knowledge and experience to meet your needs.
About-us.paragraph-3: We strive to exceed our customers expectations and ensure their complete satisfaction. Join us on this journey and experience the difference we can make in your automotive journey.

Services.title: Our Services
Services.item-1-text: We offer a wide range of cars and motorbikes for sale
Services.item-2-text: We provide high-quality repair services for your vehicle
Services.item-3-text: We offer a wide range of trailers for rent as long as you need them

Members.title: Our Members
Members.member-1-description: Roland is the founder and CEO of Bek Autó-Motor. He has been working in the automotive industry for over 10 years and has a passion for cars. He is dedicated to providing the best service possible to his customers.
Members.member-2-description: Roland is the founder and CEO of Bek Autó-Motor. He has been working in the automotive industry for over 10 years and has a passion for cars. He is dedicated to providing the best service possible to his customers.
